title: Bonus: Relationships at Work with Esther Perel
description: Work relationships are complicated. Who holds the power and why? What are effective ways to solve conflict? And how do you know when it’s time to walk away? Adam gets personal with therapist Esther Perel to explore the dynamics of trust, power, and people pleasing.
itunes:subtitle: Work relationships are complicated. Who holds the power and why?
author: podcasts@ted.com (TED)
